“Nyum, nyum…”
{CHOICE}Can I buy something?
{CHOICE}Let me rest
{CHOICE}I want to save my game

{Cloud}
“This is the Temple of the Ancients.
You won't be able to go back easily.”{PAUSE}“Is that all right?”
{CHOICE}Changed my mind
{CHOICE}Save

{Aeris}
“Whew!
We finally caught up to you.”{PAUSE}“I'm sorry.
You waited for me.”

{Aeris}
“Those are the spirit bodies of the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“They've been away from
their Planet for a long time
to protect this Temple.”

because there was only one objective
for those left in the Temple.”
